name: AT
goal:
LEITAT is a Technological Center, member of TECNIO and recognized by the Ministry of Economy and Competitiveness, that aims to collaborate with companies and institutions by adding technological value both to products and processes, and focuses its activity on research, development and industrial innovation (R+D+2i).
As Technological Partner, the Center is clearly committed to adaptation to transform the technological challenges into economic and social value. Since its foundation in 1906, LEITAT has prioritized its vocation of proximity by strengthening the principles of professionalism and respect to people and environment at the same time.
Led by the International Projects Office (IPO), LEITAT takes part each year in many projects financed by the regional and national governments, participates in projects co-funded by the European Commission, and develops private R&D projects funded by industrial partners. The project managers of the IPO have a wide experience in research projects at national and international level. LEITAT is very well established in the international R&D arena thanks to a continuous and committed participation in various European and other schemes.
LEITAT takes part and works as a technology partner in several initiatives that demonstrate its reliability as a dynamic agent in technology transfer and innovation planning in companies, entities and institutions, through different national and international organisations
interests: Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Research and Technology, Sport
euInitiatives: Circular economy, Circular economy package and plastic strategy,  Europe 2020 strategy, European Research Council, European public funds: Research and Innovation funding 2014-2020, European Resource Efficiency Platform, EU Commissionâ€™s Circular Economy Action Plan, Waste legislation and policies, Health and Environment Policy
